idea-plugin.name: ViewBinding
idea-plugin.description:
IDE support for the ViewBinding compiler plugin.
  • Resolves the generated binding property for @Screen-annotated Fragment classes
  • Gutter icon on @Screen classes showing the generated binding property
  • Quick documentation (Ctrl+Q) for the generated binding property
  • Inspection warning when manually defining a binding property that conflicts with the generated one
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0
  • Bundled FIR compiler plugin provider for K2 analysis
  • Gutter icon line marker for @Screen classes
  • Documentation provider for the generated binding property
  • Inspection for conflicting manual binding definitions

localInspection.displayName: Manual binding property conflicts with ViewBinding generated property
